alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Harris; Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 1:55PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Fort Bend, southern Montgomery and central Harris Counties through 230 PM CST... At 155 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Westbranch, or over Addicks Park Ten, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southern Conroe, Humble, Tomball, Jersey Village, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Pinehurst, Spring Branch North, The Woodlands, Greater Greenspoint, Spring, Aldine, Eldridge / West Oaks, Spring Branch West, Addicks Park Ten, Spring Valley, northwestern Northside / Northline, Kingwood and Oak Ridge North. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
